features.title: {{ProdShortName}} key features
features.description: Our solution is designed to add various types of signatures to popular document and file formats. Enrich your business processes easily.

feature_1.title: Enrich your data with signatures
feature_1.content: Append text, images, watermarks, etc. to your business documents.

feature_2.title: Protect documents content
feature_2.content: Forbid document changes by sealing it with a digital certificate.

feature_3.title: Add hidden data and barcodes
feature_3.content: Use metadata to store invisible information or put custom barcodes on pages.

feature_4.title: Manipulate signatures
feature_4.content: Search, update, or delete all signatures that have been added previously.

formats.title: 60+ file formats are supported
formats.description: {{ProdShortName}} supports almost all popular file formats

sample_index.title: Generate and add QR-code
sample_index.content: {{ProdShortName}} allows us to generate and add QR-codes to documents with supported formats. Provide the path to a document which must be signed and set up desired text and visual options of QR-code. You may put the generated QR-code image on any area of any document page.

actions.title: Ready to get started?
actions.description: Try {{ProdShortName}} features for free or request a license
actions.description_index: Try {{ProdShortName}} features for free on your platform

item_1.question: Does {{ProdShortName}} need any external library for documents signing?
item_1.answer: No, {{ProdShortName}} works independently. There are no third-party dependencies like Adobe Acrobat, Microsoft Office, etc.

item_2.question: Is it possible to test {{ProdShortName}} features before buying?
item_2.answer: Absolutely! {{ProdShortName}} offers a free trial. Install it and explore its features. Note that trial versions add 'trial badges' to your documents and only process the first 3 pages. For the full experience, obtain a free 30-day temporary license to access all functionalities. See details under [temporary license]({{LicensingUrl}}).

item_3.question: What license types are provided?
item_3.answer: Looking for a {{ProdShortName}} license? We offer various options tailored to your needs. Choose based on team size, deployment locations (single office or remote workplaces), and whether end-customer distribution requires sharing the SDK/API with clients. Alternatively, opt for a monthly usage license with metered plans—pay only for what you use. Discover the best fit for you under [pricing]({{PricingUrl}}).

cloud_links.title: {{ProdShortName}} low code APIs
cloud_links.description: Sign files using your application via our cloud-based REST API.

item_1.content: Use cURL RESTful API to put signatures on PDF, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, JPEG, and many other file formats.

item_2.content: Enrich your .NET applications with signing documents via Cloud SDK. Protect business documents in your own way.

item_3.content: {{ProdShortName}} SDK grants access to various possibilities for your Java applications to sign any files.

app_links.title: {{ProdShortName}} Web apps
app_links.description: {{ProdShortName}} presents a free web application where you can sign documents. More than 60 popular file formats could be signed via your favorite browser FOR FREE.

item_1.content: Online tool to put signatures on documents from any device.

index-content-net.head_description: Integrate digital signatures processing in your .NET apps using GroupDocs.Signature. Secure your files with signatures quickly and efficiently.
index-content-net.title: Sign documents via .NET API
index-content-net.description: Sign digital documents and images on any platform using our flexible APIs and app based solutions for programmers and end-users.
index-content-net.overview_description: API for performing document signing and related operations in .NET applications

overview_feature_1.title: Adding signatures to business documents in C#
overview_feature_1.description: Documents signing: With GroupDocs.Signature for .NET, you can add various types of signatures, such as text, images, barcodes, and digital certificates, to PDF and Office documents. This API allows you to sign your documents with nearly any data type, including hidden metadata.

overview_feature_2.title: Processing signed documents
overview_feature_2.description: Additional processing: You can perform powerful operations on signed documents using GroupDocs.Signature. This includes searching for existing signatures within business documents and verifying them using specific criteria. Additionally, you can retrieve document information and preview pages through this .NET API.

overview_feature_3.title: Customizing results
overview_feature_3.description: GroupDocs.Signature for .NET offers extensive customization options. You can precisely position signatures anywhere on a document page and adjust their appearance using a variety of settings. Furthermore, this API supports saving processed documents in a wide range of supported formats.

features.title: GroupDocs.Signature features
features.description: Signing PDFs, Office Documents, and Images swiftly and accurately

feature_1.title: Document signing
feature_1.content: Add one or multiple supported types of signatures accurately at any specified position on business documents.

feature_2.title: Customize signatures
feature_2.content: Utilize features such as color, font, border, rotation, etc., to configure the appearance of signatures.

feature_3.title: Document password protection
feature_3.content: Secure certain document types by setting a password after signing.

feature_4.title: Protection from changes
feature_4.content: Prevent changes to important business documents after appending a signature with a digital certificate.

feature_5.title: Convert signed files to other formats
feature_5.content: Convert signed files to desired formats, such as saving a Word document as a PDF.

feature_6.title: Extract page previews
feature_6.content: Extract pages from signed documents as individual images for future processing.

feature_7.title: Signature search in documents
feature_7.content: Retrieve information about previously added signatures in specific documents.

feature_8.title: Validate signed documents
feature_8.content: Verify the proper signing of documents using validation features.

feature_9.title: Update or delete signatures
feature_9.content: Easily reposition specific signatures on a page, modify their text, or delete them without any issues.

index-content-net.platforms_description: GroupDocs.Signature for .NET supports the following operating systems, frameworks and package managers
index-content-net.formats_description: GroupDocs.Signature for .NET supports operations with the following [file formats](https://docs.groupdocs.com/signature/net/supported-document-formats/).
index-content-net.code_samples_description: Some use cases of typical GroupDocs.Signature for .NET operations
index-content-net.code_samples_sample_1_content_1: Adding [QR-codes](https://docs.groupdocs.com/signature/net/esign-document-with-qr-code-signature/) to specific pages of PDF documents can enhance business processes.
index-content-net.code_samples_sample_1_content_2: Below is an example of how to add a QR code using GroupDocs.Signature.
index-content-net.code_title_sample_2: Protecting a DOCX document using a digital certificate
index-content-net.code_samples_sample_2_content_1: You can [Protect a Document](https://docs.groupdocs.com/signature/net/esign-document-with-digital-signature/) using personal or corporate signatures stored as digital certificates.
index-content-net.code_samples_sample_2_content_2: Such protected documents cannot be modified without invalidating the signature.

index-content-java.head_description: Empower Java apps by e-signatures with GroupDocs.Signature. Sign business documents quickly and effortlessly.
index-content-java.title: Sign documents via {{EnvNameShort}} API
index-content-java.description: Sign digital documents and images on any platform using our flexible APIs and app based solutions for programmers and end-users.
index-content-java.overview_description: API for performing document signing and related operations in Java applications

overview_feature_1.title: Improved business documents with digital signatures in Java
overview_feature_1.description: Swift and customizable signing: GroupDocs.Signature for Java offers a wide range of digital signature options for PDFs, images, and Office documents. You can use text, barcodes, QR-codes, digital certificates, pictures, or hidden metadata. The document processing is fast and efficient.

overview_feature_2.title: Manipulating signed documents
overview_feature_2.description: Advanced document processing involves powerful operations on signed documents using GroupDocs.Signature for Java. You can search for and validate signatures that have been added to business documents using various useful criteria. Additionally, you can access detailed information about the document or obtain preview images of its pages.

overview_feature_3.title: Variety of output choices
overview_feature_3.description: Robust signing options allow you to customize the output for documents signed with GroupDocs.Signature for Java. You can precisely position any signature on any document page and configure its appearance in various ways. The Java API supports saving signed business documents in numerous supported formats and provides options for securing them with passwords.

features.title: GroupDocs.Signature features
features.description: Signing PDFs, Office Documents, and images with digital signatures

feature_1.title: Adding Signatures
feature_1.content: Sign a document using various supported signature types by placing a digital signature precisely at any position on any page.

feature_2.title: Customizing results
feature_2.content: Customize the signature appearance by adjusting color, font, border, rotation, and other features to achieve the desired result.

feature_3.title: Securing documents with password
feature_3.content: For many supported document types, you can protect the signed document with a password.

feature_4.title: Preventing unauthorized changes
feature_4.content: Protect important business documents signed with a digital certificate from unauthorized modifications.

feature_5.title: Obtaining results in desired formats
feature_5.content: Easily obtain signed result files in any supported format. You can also convert MS Word documents to PDF effortlessly.

feature_6.title: Document preview
feature_6.content: Save any page of a document as an image for future processing.

feature_7.title: Searching for signatures
feature_7.content: It is possible to get information about previously added signatures in specific documents.

feature_8.title: Validating documents
feature_8.content: Validate the correctness of signatures on any signed document.

feature_9.title: Managing signatures
feature_9.content: Once a signature is placed on a document page, it can be deleted, moved, or updated as needed.

overview_feature_1.title: Digital Signatures Solution for Business Documents with Node.js
overview_feature_1.description: {{ProdFullName}} offers a comprehensive set of digital signature options for PDF, Office documents and images. Text, barcodes, images, digital certificates and metadata are available. Streamlined document processing ensures efficiency.

overview_feature_2.title: Advanced Manipulation of Signed Documents
overview_feature_2.description: {{ProdShortName}} empowers you to process signed documents. Search and validate signatures using various criteria. Additionally, extract detailed document information or generate preview images of pages.

overview_feature_3.title: Diverse Output Formats
overview_feature_3.description: Our solution provides extensive control over the output format of signed documents. Precisely position signatures on any page and customize their appearance. Save signed documents in numerous supported formats and optionally secure them with passwords.

features.title: Features of {{ProdShortName}}
features.description: Sign PDFs, Office documents, and images with digital signatures

feature_1.title: Business Signatures
feature_1.content: Employ various signature types to sign documents. Place digital signatures precisely on any page location.

feature_2.title: Customizing Signature Appearance
feature_2.content: Tailor the visual aspects of signatures by adjusting color, font, borders, rotation, and more to achieve your desired outcome.

feature_3.title: Password-Protected Documents
feature_3.content: For many supported document formats, safeguard signed documents with a password for added security.

feature_4.title: Preventing Unauthorized Modifications
feature_4.content: Protect crucial business documents signed with digital certificates from unauthorized alterations.

feature_5.title: Desired Output Formats
feature_5.content: Effortlessly get signed documents in any supported format. Convert MS Word documents to PDF format with ease.

feature_6.title: Documents Previewing
feature_6.content: Save individual document pages as images for future needs.

feature_7.title: Signature Search
feature_7.content: Retrieve information about previously added signatures within your documents.

feature_8.title: Document Validation
feature_8.content: Verify the authenticity of signatures presented in any document.

feature_9.title: Signature Management
feature_9.content: Delete, relocate, or modify any signatures placed on any document page.

index-content-python-net.head_description: Easily integrate secure e-signatures into Python applications using GroupDocs.Signature. Simplify and streamline your document signing workflows.
index-content-python-net.title: Sign Documents with Python API
index-content-python-net.description: Digitally sign documents and images across platforms with our flexible APIs, built for developers and end-users alike.
index-content-python-net.overview_description: A powerful document signing library designed for use in Python applications.

overview_feature_1.title: Comprehensive Digital Signatures for Business Documents in Python
overview_feature_1.description: {{ProdFullName}} provides a wide range of digital signature options, including text, barcodes, images, digital certificates, and metadata for PDFs, Office documents, and images. The solution is optimized for efficient document processing.

overview_feature_2.title: Advanced Document Processing
overview_feature_2.description: {{ProdShortName}} allows you to manage signed documents by searching and validating signatures based on multiple criteria. You can also extract detailed document data or generate page previews.

overview_feature_3.title: Flexible Output Formats
overview_feature_3.description: Our API gives you control over the final format of signed documents, enabling precise positioning of signatures, customization of their appearance, and saving in a variety of formats. Optionally, you can secure documents with passwords.

features.title: Key Features of {{ProdShortName}}
features.description: Sign PDFs, Office documents, and images with ease using digital signatures.

feature_1.title: Business Signatures
feature_1.content: Use a variety of signature types to sign documents and place them on any page in the desired location.

feature_2.title: Customizable Signature Appearance
feature_2.content: Easily customize the look of your signatures, including color, font, borders, rotation, and more, to match your needs.

feature_3.title: Password Protection
feature_3.content: Add an extra layer of security to signed documents by protecting them with passwords.

feature_4.title: Prevent Unauthorized Changes
feature_4.content: Ensure that important business documents are protected from unauthorized modifications by using digital certificates.

feature_5.title: Flexible Output Formats
feature_5.content: Generate signed documents in multiple formats. Convert Word documents to PDFs seamlessly.

feature_6.title: Document Previews
feature_6.content: Save individual document pages as images for later use.

feature_7.title: Signature Search
feature_7.content: Easily find and retrieve information about any previously added signatures in your documents.

feature_8.title: Document Validation
feature_8.content: Verify the authenticity of signatures in any document to ensure integrity.

feature_9.title: Manage Signatures
feature_9.content: Easily delete, move, or edit signatures on any page of the document.
